title: Discover the Artefact's Secrets
content: 4: Talk to the captain of the Githyanki Creche. The captain is looking for the artefact we carry. We should speak to her and see what we can find out. Objective 5: Talk to the inquisitor in the Githyanki Creche. The inquisitor is displeased with the lack of progress on the hunt for the artefact. We should speak to him to find out more - the githyanki seem desperate to find it. Objective 6: Defeat the inquisitor in the Githyanki Creche. The inquisitor demanded that we hand over the artefact, but
